summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Seattle City Light Department, authorizing the grant of an easement for surface water drainage, upon, and across a portion of City of Seattle's Duwamish Substation in the northwest quarter of Section 4 and the northeast quarter of Section 5, Township 23 North, Range 4 East, W.M., in King County, Washington (P.M. \#230404-2-302).
